81236.仲間モンスターを\nなでた人の 記録です。\n<break>:
A record of people who've stroked your
fellow monster.
<break>

81420.どの仲間モンスターを\nお庭でのんびり させますか？\n<break>:
Which monster would you like to leave in
your garden to relax?
<break>

81421.<%sL_MONSTERNAME>を お庭でのんびりさせますか？\nお庭にはなす:
Would you like to leave <%sL_MONSTERNAME>
in the garden? You can't move this house
unless you take them out.
<yesno><break>

81422.どうぐかばんが いっぱいのため \nおくりものが ひろえません。\n<end>:
Your item bag is full, so you cannot receive
these gifts.
<end>

81423.仲間モンスターを なでた人は\nまだ いません。\n<end>:
No one has stroked your monster yet.
<end>

81424.まだ 仲間モンスターを スカウトしていません。\n<end>:
You have not scouted any monsters yet.
<end>

81425.<%sL_MONSTERNAME>の すごしかたを\n『お庭でのんびり』に変更し:
<%sL_MONSTERNAME> will spend its time
relaxing here!
<end>

81426.<%sL_MONSTERNAME>は 近所をおさんぽ中です。\nモンスターのおう:
<%sL_MONSTERNAME> is currently wandering
around. Would you like it to return to this
monster house?
<yesno><break>

81428.<%sL_MONSTERNAME>は\nお庭でのんびり しています。\n近所をお:
<%sL_MONSTERNAME> is relaxing in his garden.
Would you like me to take him for a walk
around the neighborhood?
<yesno><break>

81431.なんと <%sL_MONSTERNAME>が\nあなたへのおくりものを 置いてく:
It appears that <%sL_MONSTERNAME> has
left a gift for you! Receive the gift now?
<yesno><break>

81462.<%sL_MONSTERNAME>を\nどのように すごさせますか？\n<sel:
How you like <%sL_MONSTERNAME> to spend
their time?
<select_se_off>
Relax Here
Wander Around
<select_end><break>

81463.<%sL_MONSTERNAME>を ひっこめますか？\n<%sL_MONSTE:
Do you want to retract <%sL_MONSTERNAME>? If
you have <%sL_MONSTERNAME> in your party, it
will go back to following you.
<yesno><break>

81464.<%sL_MONSTERNAME>を\nお庭でのんびり 過ごすようにしました！\:
We've got <%sL_MONSTERNAME> out
in the garden for you!<end>

84492.さらに 箱の底に キラリとかがやく\n宝石のようなものがある……！\n<se S:
In addition, there was a sparkling jewel at the bottom of the box...!
<%sL_PC> received <%sL_ITEM>!

84493.さらに 箱の底に キラリとかがやく\n宝石のようなものがある……！\n<se S:
In addition, there was a sparkling jewel at the bottom of the box...!
<%sL_PC> received <%dL_NUM> <%sL_ITEM>!

84494.仲間モンスターを お庭にはなせませんでした。\n<end>:
We couldn't let the companion monster into the
garden.
<end>

84496.どうぐかばんが いっぱいのため\nおくりものを 受け取れませんでした。\nどうぐ:
You could not receive your gift because your
item bag is full. 1 item bag space is needed.
<end>

84497.仲間モンスターを ひっこめられませんでした。\n<end>:
I couldn't get the companion monster to back
off.
<end>

84498.権限がないため その処理はできません。\n<end>: You don't have permission to do that.<end>

134983.おくりものが あるため\n仲間モンスターを ひっこめられませんでした。\n<en:
The company was not able to pull down the
companion monster because of the gifts.
<end>
